snippet.title: Heat and Run | Early Access Launch Trailer | OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Heat and Run is now available on Steam Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1225790/Heat_and_Run/

A lot of improvements and features have been added since the demo and we will continue to develop this unique online experience. New heroes, maps, relics and functions are well underway internally, and will be making their way to the game over time. We can't wait to hear what all of you think!

Please feel free to join our community on discord right now to make suggestions you might have that will help us realize the best possible version of Heat and Run.

➤ discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/HjMefbK

And follow us on:

➤ twitter: https://twitter.com/Heat_and_Run
➤ instagram: https://www.instagram.com/heat_and_run
➤ tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@heatandrun
➤ facebook: https://www.facebook.com/heatandrun.game
